channel.title: Error_Game_JS5connect message when friends run my client folder
channel.description:
So I have been coding for about a week, I'm very new to it and have had a rough idea of how the stuff works. I have a 718 source & client called citellum. I have port forwarded correctly and have a NO-IP address and have put the NO-IP in the clients 'Loader.Java' (replacing 127.0.0.1) also I have compiled the client after changing. After all this I compressed the client and loaded it to Mediafire for my friend to download. When he extracts the file to his desktop he gets the error message: Error_Game_JS5connect. I'm sure there is nothing else needed to be done for him to connect, I have NO-IP running and the source so logically he should be able to connect right?
Help is appreciated thanks :)
